nodes.bodyText: Could you update this method's javadoc to separate "throw" from "timeout"? This was a fairly convoluted setup to begin with; if someone has to troubleshoot it, I'd rather they have all the detail for what this method is supposed to do.
Of course! some how I totally didn't see the javadoc...
I updated the javadoc. If it is not clear enough, then please let me know.
